entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: A few flurries ending this evening then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind east 30 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 7. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Sunday 15 May 2016

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning and early in the afternoon. Periods of light snow beginning in the afternoon. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Sunday 15 May 2016

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Blowing snow with visibilities at times less than 2 kilometres late in the evening and overnight. Amount 2 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 increasing to 50 gusting to 70 late in the evening. Low minus 4. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Sunday 15 May 2016
